subject: ORDER #SSN3264
description_text:
Hi there,

I ordered the Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional × 1
Plus X P3-H3 / Black / without Baseplate

I would like to return the product. It is still in the original shipping box and has not been opened or un-packed

It was received November 11, 2025

Kind regards,

Robert Tenwesteneind
ORDER #SSN326

conversations.body_text: Hi Rob TenWesteneind,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Is there a problem with your product?

No there is not any problem with the product. It is still in the original
package un opened still.



We just want to return it for a refund



*

Hi Rob TenWesteneind,    Alright, you may return the package to our U.S. warehouse. We will process your refund after receiving and inspecting the item. Please ensure the packaging is intact and the product shows no signs of use, otherwise the return request will not be approved.       MZ CAChino13402 YORBA AVENUE,  Unit 102,  Chino, CA  91710  USA  +1 480-387-3114
